text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 30.1. Alif-Laam-Meem 30.2. Roomi maghloob hogaye hain 30.3. Nazdeek ki zamin per aur woh maghloon honey kay baad un-qareeb ghalib aajayen gay 30.4. Chand saal mein hi. Iss say pehlay aur iss kay baad bhi ikhtiyar Allah Taalaa hi ka hai. Uss roz musalman shaadmaan hongay
